channel.title: Need help with a command
channel.description:
Alright, i've seen this on a server, one that is being hosted. I thought it was really neat but was not sure how to make it. The command, while in game, was ::todo (then type things you need to do) and its things like, fix glitches etc etc. When you typed that and the message you typed, it sent that message to well i guess a to do list.java list.
So how could i make that command when i do that command and type w/e i want after it, it goes to the to do list.java?
Thanks

item.title: Need help with a command
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("todo")) { BufferedWriter bw = null; String todo = command.substring(5); try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("todo.txt", true)); bw.write(todo); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) { try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sM("Error Writing to File."); } } } }

BufferedWriter FTW

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a command
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Not sure what that is, i jus tneed a command to do ::todo (text) and then it sends that info to a document in my server folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a command
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

You could use BufferedWriter to have it write to a text file.

Read full topic
